column2: text
Out of the test
Out of the test
Out of the test
Out of the test
Out of the mouth of children and infants, you have brought forth praise.
Let us not sleep on as the rest do, but let us stay awake and keep our senses.
When [Jehovah] says something, will he not do it
Where are your stings, Odeath
Through God we shall play a sturdy part,  and he himself will trample down our foes.
give thanks in everything
But let him ask in faith, without any doubting;
[Love’s]  flashes are flashes of fire,  Jehovah’s flame-throwing. Much water cannot quench love,  and rivers will not sweep it away;
Do not be afraid,
try the quality of everything
he reveals his secret to his servants the prophets.
let us love each other, because love is from God
take off everything heavy
And be yours not the outward adornment
Listen to me and eat good things, and let your cravings be delighted with fat things;
A patient man is better than a champion fighter,  and one who has command over his spirit than one who takes a city.
You shall set them as viceroys all through the earth
it is by grace you are saved
be submissive to superior authorities
the spirit of Jehovah seized upon him
in accordance with the eternal purpose he framed in the Christ our Lord Jesus
If Jehovah had not been a help to me  my soul was almost finding its dwelling in the land of silence.
The sequel of humility is fear of Jehovah,  riches, honor, and life.
pass over offenses
have women adorn themselves by virtuous self-restraint with modesty What befits women who profess religiousness
and boast of the hope of God’s glory.
God’s peace beyond the highest reach of any mind will guard your hearts and thoughts
Father in heaven, may thy name be kept holy,
What return shall I make to Jehovah  for all his dealings with me?
in you I take pleasure.”
